docs.text: Four Decades of the Einstein Chair Seminar The conference will be held on Jan 17-19, 2023 at CUNY Graduate Center. To attend the conference, please fill in the registration form following the link below: Registration Speakers Richard Canary (University of Michigan) Moira Chas (Stony Brook University) Ralph Cohen (Stanford University) Gregory Falkovich (Weizmann Institute of Science) Edson de Faria (University of Sao Paulo) Ruth Lawrence (Hebrew University) Manuel Rivera (Purdue University) Nathan Seiberg (Institute of Advance Study) Nathalie Wahl (University of Copenhagen) Organizers Ara Basmajian Bora Ferlengez Frederick Gardiner Yunping Jiang Jun Hu Linda Keen Ilya Kofman Vincent Martinez Scott Wilson Mahmoud Zeinalian Currently, the webpage is being built.
